Name: Emma Adventure
About the game: Emma Adventure Indie RPG Game. You have to take on the role of a young girl named Emma, a brave and curious girl. Go on an adventure to travel to another city and face many obstacles in search of something. Whether she will reach her goal is up to you. The adventure has begun Features: - An exciting short adventure with lots of traps. - Pixel graphics. - Simple controls (mouse + keyboard). Warning: - This game is not for the impatient. - You have to make a lot of effort to finish this game. Don't give up Have fun
